short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Default Economist article pages is two narrow when you blocked ads (even to a subscriber).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Default Economist article pages is two narrow when you blocked ads (even to a subscriber). Make it to 90% width.
